subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Tennessee whittled Michigan’s lead to 72-71 with six seconds left, but Jarnell Stokes was called for a charge against the senior Wolverines forward Jordan Morgan.
snippet: Tennessee whittled Michigan’s lead to 72-71 with six seconds left, but Jarnell Stokes was called for a charge against the senior Wolverines forward Jordan Morgan.
